Text: Awesome dude, been looking for this for awhile now. Been wanting to play it ever since I beat it like 13 years ago lol.
I must kneel before you, thank you for this and other MaM games, I loved them and own them  all, but they wont work on win 7 or 8, this is perfect. Thx again...
ah, the memories... glorious, addicting game.
A great part of my childhood ... thx man
